thread.title: Japan recovery at turning point as wages, spending fall

title: Japan recovery at turning point as wages, spending fall
text:
Japan recovery at turning point as wages, spending fall 12:55pm BST - 01:32 
Japan's longest run of economic expansion since the 1980s asset bubble may be entering a turning point, with data on Friday suggesting consumption will fail to drive growth if trade frictions undermine exports. David Pollard reports.   
Japan's longest run of economic expansion since the 1980s asset bubble may be entering a turning point, with data on Friday suggesting consumption will fail to drive growth if trade frictions undermine exports. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2qaodH6
